product_name: Marmot Thermo Hoodie Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Knock back the cold on early morning runs or skate ski laps in the Marmot Thermo Hoodie Jacket. With a close fit and warm, stretchy Polartec(R) fleece, you'll feel invincible. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) High Efficiency(TM) fleece keeps your skin dry when you sweat by using two different yarn fibers: one wicks, the other dries quickly. The Marmot Thermo Hoodie features flatlock seams that eliminate chafing. Elastic-bound cuffs have thumbholes for extra hand coverage. Zippered chest pocket. Closeout.
